item.description:
let's meetup at toad in cambridge at 7pm on wednesday, 25 march, to hear les sampou. a few of us saw les sampou at her 7 february show at atwoods tavern and she was just terrific.

here's a link to the toad website. (click the 'Directions' tab at the top of the page for driving and T information.)

visit her website for more information on les.

other notes:

i'll probably be able to get there early enough to snag a table --the place is usually deserted at 6:30, but fills up quickly-- but if you can get there close to 7pm you can help me stake our claim.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email my cell # to everyone who rsvps 'Yes' by noon wednesday, 25 march
item.name: les sampou @ toad
